title: Can't Connect to a Game
body: Can't Connect to a game that has been playing for about 1hr 30mins now and it's not just me and it's my whole and the whole entire enemey team aswell will somone please take a look at this

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=KXEaytxP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T02:44:26.817+0000)
>
> It's possible one of the games "shards" have crashed again, this occurred yesterday. Once Riot catches wind this will be fixed ASAP.
> 
> 
> see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/dgGbeYVY-server-crash) thread for yesterday's issue.

Thank you, but how long until they get ahold of this been like 3hrs already

It's possible one of the games "shards" have crashed again, this occurred yesterday. Once Riot catches wind this will be fixed ASAP.


see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/dgGbeYVY-server-crash) thread for yesterday's issue.

Wouldnt mind knowing whats up with it
Missin my  {{champion:89}}  bae
